snippet: A 2008 Olympic race walk champion said he was excluded from the London Games after failing a doping test; a champion French sprint cyclist was upset; officials marked the 40th anniversary of the Munich attacks.
abstract: Olympics Roundup; Italian race walk champion Alex Schwazer, who won gold in 2008, is excluded from the London Games for failing a doping test.
lead_paragraph: A 2008 Olympic race walk champion said he was excluded from the London Games after failing a doping test; a champion French sprint cyclist was upset; officials marked the 40th anniversary of the Munich attacks.

headline.main: Beijing Race Walk Medalist Says He Was Barred for Doping
